Appropriate support materials --> |B-Class-5= y |US-task-force=yes |ACW-task-force=yes |Biography-task-force=yes }} {{WikiProject Biography|living = no |class = B |military-work-group = yes <!-- Military --> |listas = Lowrey, Mark Perrin }} }}
{{dyktalk|27 February|2009|entry=... that '''[[Mark Perrin Lowrey|Brigadier General Mark Perrin Lowrey]]''', the founder of [[Blue Mountain College]], died at age 56 while buying a train ticket?|views=2221}}
== Article in one edit ==
How did this article come fully formed in one edit, and end up on my watchlist? Where was it cut and pasted from? --[[User:Richard Arthur Norton (1958- )|Richard Arthur Norton (1958- )]] ([[User talk:Richard Arthur Norton (1958- )|talk]]) 19:10, 16 February 2009 (UTC)
== Article in one edit ==
This is my 9th Article in one edit, I created it in [[User:Lordoliver/Sandbox|My Sandbox]]. I'm not sure how you already had it on your watchlist it has never been created before. [[User:Lordoliver|<font color="maroon">'''Lord R. Oliver I'''</font>]] <sup>[[User talk:Lordoliver|<font color="Silver">His Lordship's Court</font>]]</sup> 19:14, 16 February 2009 (UTC)
*Excellent article. --[[User:Richard Arthur Norton (1958- )|Richard Arthur Norton (1958- )]] ([[User talk:Richard Arthur Norton (1958- )|talk]]) 19:20, 16 February 2009 (UTC)
